body_html:
Could not pass the unit test on my computer with CUDA enabled. The loss returns by gpu_ctc is always zero. In the same computer, with torch binding, it passes all the test. @SeanNaren
Running ./test_gpu gives following error message:

Running GPU tests
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  Error: compute_ctc_loss in small_test, stat = execution failed
Aborted (core dumped)
body_text:
Could not pass the unit test on my computer with CUDA enabled. The loss returns by gpu_ctc is always zero. In the same computer, with torch binding, it passes all the test. @SeanNaren
Running ./test_gpu gives following error message:
Running GPU tests
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  Error: compute_ctc_loss in small_test, stat = execution failed
Aborted (core dumped)
body:
Could not pass the unit test on my computer with CUDA enabled. The loss returns by gpu_ctc is always zero. In the same computer, with torch binding, it passes all the test. @SeanNaren 
Running `./test_gpu` gives following error message:
```python
Running GPU tests
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  Error: compute_ctc_loss in small_test, stat = execution failed
Aborted (core dumped)
```
